text:
Ernest Ferrell Bowman (July 28, 1935 – August 4, 2019) was an American professional baseball player. He was an infielder who appeared in 165 games in Major League Baseball for the San Francisco Giants from 1961 to 1963.
He retired in 1969. Bowman died at his home in Johnson City, Tennessee on August 4, 2019 at the age of 84.
